data.title: Regent University
data.meta_description: Explore rankings and statistics behind Regent University with Prepler. Can you get in and is this the right college for you?
data.text:
To help you, we use Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to analyze and process college and course data. All college data is sourced from the U.S. Department of Education National Center for Education Statistics survey. All course data is sourced directly from our partner Colleges and Universities. College reviews are based on the compilation of hundreds of college guidebooks and millions of online reviews.

All personalized degree pathway calculations are based on the school's course catalog data, department degree requirements and general academic advising.
